name: Hold On
description: a work that I give the title "Hold On" is a work where I visualize my anxiety as an artist, where I am always stuck while working. From economic problems, romance, family divorce, to bad words from people about what I do, I was fed up with it all and almost stopped drawing. maybe this is one of the works that aims to say that I can still, what I do is not in vain and believe that one day I will make an explosion and inspire many people through my work.
